com.giift.sdk.util

Class GetLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.giift.sdk.util.GetLocation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.location.LocationListener

    public class GetLocation
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.location.LocationListener
    Class to call the location Services to get current location of the device Set android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION in your Manifest
    Author:
    vieony on 25/2/2015.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  GetLocation.LocationCallback
      Interface to be implemented by the calling class if it wants to receive the result returns current location of the device if available null if not available

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getLocation()
      Method tries to get current location else shows an alert to enable location services (if user has not disabled reminder or 24hrs have not passed since the last reminder)
